name: Sandal Attar
description: Pure sandalwood attar crafted from authentic Indian sandalwood. This traditional fragrance oil offers a warm, woody, and creamy aroma that's both calming and sophisticated.

name: Oud Attar
description: Luxurious Oud attar derived from precious agarwood. Known as "liquid gold," this premium attar offers an intensely rich, woody, and slightly sweet aroma.

name: Miziyan Attar
description: An exquisite blend of traditional fragrances creating a unique aromatic experience. Miziyan Attar combines floral and woody notes in perfect harmony.

name: Musk Rijali
description: A captivating musk-based attar that embodies sensuality and warmth. Musk Rijali offers a clean, skin-like scent with animalic undertones.

name: Mystic Amber Oudh
description: Our signature creation! Mystic Amber Oudh is an exclusive blend crafted by Choudhary Perfumes, combining the richness of amber with the depth of oud.

name: Dior Homme Intense EDP
description: A sophisticated interpretation of modern masculinity. This master copy captures the essence of the iconic Dior Homme Intense.

name: Miss Dior Rose Essence EDT
description: A romantic floral fragrance that celebrates femininity and elegance. This master copy of Miss Dior Rose Essence captures the essence of fresh roses at dawn.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Devotion Parfum
description: A gourmand masterpiece that's irresistibly delicious. This master copy of D&G Devotion opens with sparkling citrus and hazelnut cream.

name: Dolce & Gabbana The One EDT
description: A timeless oriental floral fragrance for sophisticated men. This master copy of The One EDT combines spicy freshness with tobacco warmth and amber depth.

name: Paco Rabanne 1 Million Parfum
description: The ultimate statement of luxury and confidence. This master copy of 1 Million Parfum is an intense leather fragrance with salty notes, tuberose, and tonka bean.

name: Parfums de Marly Delina Exclusif Parfum
description: Niche luxury in a bottle. This master copy of Delina Exclusif is an opulent rose fragrance enhanced with fruity notes and creamy vanilla.

name: Versace Pour Homme EDT
description: Mediterranean freshness meets Italian elegance. This master copy of Versace Pour Homme is an aromatic aquatic fragrance combining citrus, florals, and woody amber.

name: YSL Libre Le Parfum
description: Freedom expressed through fragrance. This master copy of YSL Libre Le Parfum is a bold lavender fragrance enhanced with orange blossom and vanilla orchid.

name: YSL Y Le Parfum
description: For the generation that dares. This master copy of YSL Y Le Parfum intensifies the iconic Y fragrance with darker woods, lavender intensity, and sensual vanilla.
